description: In this course students read and write contemporary poetry intensively and explore the writer's craft. Students peer-edit each others' writing. Prerequisite: English 150 or previous college-level creative writing course with instructor's permission. For the academic year 2009-10, the prerequisites are GE 111 and sophomore status.
name: Intermed Poetry Wrtg
notes: This course has class year limits.
